originalText.text:
Alexis and Chryssie have an overwhelming amount of knowledge as they have worked on Broadway and in film and television. I can’t say enough about BAC and I’m so grateful for Chryssie and Alexis.
Through Broadway Arts Community I have gained classes, training, mentors, friends and more. It is such a loving and supportive community. I feel more prepared than ever to tackle auditions and work on my craft thanks to their teaching and guidance.

text.text:
Alexis and Chryssie have an overwhelming amount of knowledge as they have worked on Broadway and in film and television. I can’t say enough about BAC and I’m so grateful for Chryssie and Alexis.
Through Broadway Arts Community I have gained classes, training, mentors, friends and more. It is such a loving and supportive community. I feel more prepared than ever to tackle auditions and work on my craft thanks to their teaching and guidance.

originalText.text: If you are looking to grow as a person, an artist, AND connect with amazing people, Broadway Arts Community is the place to do it! Chryssie and Alexis have cultivated a community of artists who are so kind, and passionate. Chryssie and Alexis have a wealth of knowledge and are excellent teachers and mentors. BAC has made an indelibly positive impact on my life. And I promise you, they will do the same for you!

text.text: If you are looking to grow as a person, an artist, AND connect with amazing people, Broadway Arts Community is the place to do it! Chryssie and Alexis have cultivated a community of artists who are so kind, and passionate. Chryssie and Alexis have a wealth of knowledge and are excellent teachers and mentors. BAC has made an indelibly positive impact on my life. And I promise you, they will do the same for you!

originalText.text: Broadway Arts Community has been so supportive and encouraging, providing me with incredible coaching and insight that has given me the opportunity to experience such extraordinary growth as an artist and a person. From my time getting to work with Chryssie Whitehead and Alexis Carra, I have grasped onto a wealth of knowledge and wisdom about the industry, as well as gone through much improvement with my skills. They have both taught me self-love and the importance of practice makes progress. I am forever grateful for my time with them and all that they have offered me through their amazing program!

text.text: Broadway Arts Community has been so supportive and encouraging, providing me with incredible coaching and insight that has given me the opportunity to experience such extraordinary growth as an artist and a person. From my time getting to work with Chryssie Whitehead and Alexis Carra, I have grasped onto a wealth of knowledge and wisdom about the industry, as well as gone through much improvement with my skills. They have both taught me self-love and the importance of practice makes progress. I am forever grateful for my time with them and all that they have offered me through their amazing program!

originalText.text:
I’ve been fans of Alexis Carra and Chryssie Whitehead for years. Their work in Fosse inspired me to study the art form. I attended a Sacred Space one day intensive in 2019. I left feeling more confident in what I had to offer as an artist, inspired by the deep work we did and in awe of the passion and vulnerability everyone was brave and bold enough to display that day. I was also fortunate to participate in a virtual intensive with the legendary Ann Reinking, a few months before she passed. A special experience I’ll never forget.

I cannot recommend BAC enough. Performers, if you are in need of a recharge, look no further. Chryssie and Alexis are amazing, caring and knowledgeable artists and mentors who will help guide you. They will encourage you to be the best YOU you can be.

text.text:
I’ve been fans of Alexis Carra and Chryssie Whitehead for years. Their work in Fosse inspired me to study the art form. I attended a Sacred Space one day intensive in 2019. I left feeling more confident in what I had to offer as an artist, inspired by the deep work we did and in awe of the passion and vulnerability everyone was brave and bold enough to display that day. I was also fortunate to participate in a virtual intensive with the legendary Ann Reinking, a few months before she passed. A special experience I’ll never forget.

I cannot recommend BAC enough. Performers, if you are in need of a recharge, look no further. Chryssie and Alexis are amazing, caring and knowledgeable artists and mentors who will help guide you. They will encourage you to be the best YOU you can be.

originalText.text: Alexis and Chryssie are the gifts that keep on giving. I first started training through BAC in April, 2020 through their very intimate and rewarding Mentorship program. During that month I felt seen in a way I never had before by a teacher, and have since become a much more confident actor and performer. They meet you where you’re at, build upon your strengths, and help you find your own process. BAC is exactly the type of training program we need in the musical theatre world right now. ♥️
